snippet: Notwithstanding reports that he was kicked out of the Park Slope Food Co-op, Adrian Grenier says he was not kicked out but that he joined a new Brooklyn food co-op.
abstract: Notwithstanding reports that he was kicked out of the Park Slope Food Co-op, Adrian Grenier says he was not kicked out but that he joined a new Brooklyn food co-op.

headline.main: Actor Is Said to Be Kicked Out of Co-op. He Says Otherwise.
